data.DescriptionHtml:
A green ray stabs from your pointing finger to strike the belly of your enemy.

You must succeed on a ranged touch attack with the ray to strike a target. A subject that is successfully targeted must make a Fortitude save or be paralyzed for the duration of the spell.

A subject of the ray that succeeds on its Fortitude save is instead sickened for the duration of the spell. Neutralize poison removes the sickened condition.

Material Component: A small scrap of cloth taken from clothing worn by a ghoul, or a pinch of earth from a ghoul's lair.
data.Name: Ghoul Gesture
